Join filmmaker Robin Hauser Reynolds, whose new documentary, “Code,” explores the issue; Nick Rockwell, CTO at The New York Times; Minerva Tantoco, CTO for New York City; Myrna Soto, Senior Vice President Global Chief Information Security Officer at Comcast; and Jazmine Hughes, Associate Editor at The New York Times.
